ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/17/2003 12:12:55 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Su I think rezzes would still be good... maybe do less exp loss if you re rezzed but still
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/17/2003 12:12:55 AM Eastern Standard Time, MLockridge01@... writes:

>Good point. The only good thing I thought of for corpse runs was
that you
>can be summoned back to your corpse so you don't have to make the
trek to
>wherever you died all over again. But yeah, if you can't find your
corpse
>it's a royal pain.
>Would you have it so you have all your gear but can still be rezzed? or
>would you just eliminate rezzes?
>luv,
>-Su


Su I think rezzes would still be good... maybe do less exp loss if you're rezzed but still have all your gear. Or lose a percentage of cash on hand if you aren't rezzed... something to make rezzing still worthwhile but less of a hassle if you can't get it done.

I like the NPC idea too... that would be great b/c then you wouldn't have to go back somewhere dangerous (and without all the gear to help protect you!) to get your body back.

I have to say though... I am grateful that you don't lose all your spells too when you die... it would suck to have to buy all of them back again!


"Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
